text:
asked miguel about materials for the laser cutter and here was his response:

For our laser, plastic materials will be 1/8in. We’ve done paper stencils before however. Wood can be up to 1/4 in.
Unfortunately, we can’t do metal which would be quite ideal but expensive.
We don’t have the laser up and running yet. ADX does however.
We need some ducting to exhaust the smell out still.
